text: James Small (1740, Dalkeith, Midlothian – 1793) was a Scottish inventor instrumental in the invention of the modern-style iron swing plough in 1779–80. . Date also given as 1763 () or 1784 () ==References== ==External links== * Dunse History Society Category:1740 births Category:1793 deaths Category:Scottish inventors Category:People from Dalkeith Category:18th- century Scottish people
title: James Small (inventor)
